contents.text: Thank you for calling Amazon Web Services in San Francisco, your enterprise B2B cloud and AI partner—start building on AWS today.
For sales and enterprise solutions, press 1.
To discuss enterprise deployments and custom integrations, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our Enterprise Solutions team.

navigationGoals: Discuss enterprise deployment options and obtain pricing for custom integrations.
I need enterprise solutions and pricing details to set up a secure, scalable cluster for my defense-analytics startup.
I need to discuss custom Terraform-based integration for our microservices on AWS.
I need help speaking to a specialist about integrating AWS into my company’s systems.
I’d like to explore enterprise-grade deployment options for running large-scale physics simulations on AWS.

contents.text: For AI and machine learning services information, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our AI and Machine Learning specialists.

navigationGoals: Learn about AWS AI/ML service features and get a cost estimate for a pilot project.
I need help planning and training an AWS-based image-detection model for a search-and-rescue drone project.
I want to explore fine-tuning a transformer model on SageMaker using custom Docker containers.
I’d like information on how to use AWS’s AI and machine learning services.
I need details on AWS machine learning tools for analyzing my experimental physics datasets.

contents.text: For support with your AWS services, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to AWS technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a critical AWS service error affecting my infrastructure.
I need assistance fixing SSH access failures on my EC2 servers after recent configuration changes.
I need help troubleshooting a Lambda function timeout in our production environment.
My AWS service isn’t working and I need technical support to fix it.
I need assistance troubleshooting errors when deploying my physics simulation code on an EC2 instance.

contents.text: For billing, account management, and invoices, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our Billing and Account team.

navigationGoals: Review my recent AWS invoice and resolve a billing discrepancy.
I need to dispute a charge on my AWS invoice and ask about eligibility for veteran small-business credits.
I need a detailed breakdown of my latest AWS billing for EC2 and data transfer charges.
I need assistance understanding and paying my AWS bill.
I have questions about charges on my AWS student research account invoice and want to update my payment method.
